mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_REPLY( USER_NAME, CONTENT, COMM_NUM, REPLY_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( #{userName}, #{content}, #{commNum}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{regId} )
INSERT INTO T_BEDU_REPLY( USER_NAME, CONTENT, QS_NUM, ANS_NUM, REPLY_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( #{userName}, #{content}, #{qsNum}, #{ansNum}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NUM AS replyNum, CONTENT, REPLY_DATE AS replyDate, REG_DATE AS regDate, REG_ID AS regId, USER_NAME AS userName FROM T_BEDU_REPLY WHERE COMM_NUM = #{commNum} ORDER BY REPLY_DATE ASC

SELECT REPLY_NUM AS replyNum, CONTENT, REPLY_DATE AS replyDate, REG_DATE AS regDate, QS_NUM AS qsNum, ANS_NUM AS ansNum, USER_NAME AS userName FROM T_BEDU_REPLY WHERE QS_NUM = #{qsNum} ORDER BY REPLY_DATE ASC
